abstract: With new printing techniques and materials, you can do far more than just enlarge a favorite photograph for framing.
snippet: With new printing techniques and materials, you can do far more than just enlarge a favorite photograph for framing.
lead_paragraph: While digital cameras have largely shoved aside film cameras, how we store and show off our snapshots has changed little since the heyday of Kodachrome. Overstuffed shoeboxes have simply been replaced with cluttered hard drives and Flickr streams, leatherbound albums supplanted by Facebook uploads.

headline.main: A Picture on the Wall? Why Not Do the Whole Wall?
headline.print_headline: A Picture on the Wall? Why Not Do the Whole Wall?
